title: Fire in the Wall
description: Either Logan is crazy, or the entire world is in danger. Logan sees things he knows aren't real: Sexy things. Twisted things. Deadly things. His best friend Lil is the only one who believes his visions are real. And one dark and thunderous night, she proves it by walking through a huge fiery rift in the basement wall.Now, not only do people think he's crazy, they blame him for her disappearance. Logan has two choices: Run away because he's a danger to everyone... or follow Lil into his nightmares.
author: Sarah G. Dunster
